main.name: Divyesh Patel
main.description: I'm Passionate about building Web applications and solving complex business problems

projects.title: !PetsLiFestyLE
projects.description: !PeTsLifestyLE is the website Created Using Rails, Bootstrap, and postgreSql. The main goal for this project was to create a website where User can read and write an article about pets. Users can also vote and comment on an article but to do that users need to signup and login

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Netflix Clone using ReactJs, TMDB API. The main goal for this project was to make website identical to Netflix using React and pulling data from TMDB API. User can watch available movie trailer

projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.description: COVID-19 Tracker using ReactJs,disease.sh COVID-19 API. The main goal for this project was to show all the covid cases as Total Active Cases, Recoverd, and Deaths in the country.
